content: Finally blocked this dude. The bad takes were one thing but this is just downright irresponsible. GitHub had already changed the key, and it was mentioned later in the same paragraph that his screenshot was from. He cut that part off in the screenshot.

photo.alt: A tweet from @allenholub with a screenshot from GitHub’s announcement that their RSA key was briefly exposed. The tweet read “Sorry the cat’s out of the bag, GitHub is no longer secure (at least not until they change their keys).” GitHub had already changed the key, and that was mentioned later in the same paragraph that the screenshot was from.
